title.rendered: “Important Siren Test Today: IDF Alerts for Tiberias and Upper Poria Residents”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Sirens tests by the Home Front Command will take place today in the Tiberias and Upper Poria areas.

Sirens tests by the Home Front Command will occur today (Monday) at 10:05 AM in the city of Tiberias and at 12:05 PM in the Upper Poria community.

If a genuine alert is activated, an additional ascending and descending siren will be heard.
At the same time, an alert will also be distributed through the Home Front Command app and other supplementary warning systems.

Additional information can be found at the Home Front Command call center at phone number 104, via WhatsApp messages to the phone number 052-9104104, on the national portal at oref.org.il, and on social media.
